reviews.text: This store is clean and fast service.

Good McDonald's quick and easy.

The employees are always nice . But idk what it is I been coming here for a long time . Last few times food sent my entire family to the bathroom . Never coming here again . They also always give you old hard fries ? Should be fresh fries every time like other McDonaldâ€™s? The burgers have been tasting weird too . Need to get your quality back up

I dont know where the manager is, who should take the responsibilities? I urge MacDonalds authority to look after carefully to this location

Used to be really good!! Service and food slowly declined after they renovated a year ago and hired new employees. Not sure whats going on. Atmosphere and space/design of the place was more family friendly. Employees took orders to tables. Food was always spot on. After renovation it feels claustrophobic/closed in and service has declined. Order is always messed up whether u order in or delivery. Food doesnt taste as good anymore. Sad itâ€™s not the same

This smoothie has done it for me, this is so disgusting, they don't clean their machines, I want to throw up. And maybe open an investigation on this mc Donald's location bc this is quite disgusting

How i place an order thru Uber eats and lord and behold I'm missing an entire meal.  Like do these workers not confirm what the receipt says to what they put in the bag.  TERRIBLE SERVICE WILL NEVER ORDER FROM THIS MCDONALD'S AGAIN. CANT CALL THE LOCATION BECAUSE NO ONE ANSWERS

We all know generally how Mcdonald's food taste and it's good and if you are very hungry it taste very good. I have been coming to this particular Mcdonald's for over 15 years and I 've seen it transform from OK to really great. This Mcdonald is a really nice place to visit especially with your kids or grandkids. The playground is a great open area and is huge, the kids really enjoy themselves there. the place is clean and the staff are decent. This is a really nice Mcdonalds. I also wanted to add that this particular location doesn't  offer coffee discount for senior citizens. Also, this location doesn't have sugar free syrup for pancakes. I asked the store manager about the sugar free syrup and the response was," in all the years I've worked here no customer has ever asked for sugar free syrup" I was taken back by that response because the Bronx has the highest rate of diabetes among the five boroughs, with 16% of adults diagnosed with the disease. These are statistical facts and that may be higher today. This franchise
Should consider the senior discounts and diabetes friendly approach. Just my opinion. Otherwise, this Mcdonald's location is very welcoming and a great eat in fast food restaurant.
Not a fan of the all  gender bathroom

My son went there and he was trying to buy his meal with a gift card, and the self machine took the order and the money but he did not received any receipt, and then he called me,  I checked the balance and itâ€™s showed that they took the money, when he asked to an employee, the employee was rude and he denied to help him.
I love the two for six and soft drink deals.
Good

IM REPORTING THIS IMMIDIEATLY TO HQ.

This was my first time eating at this location. I'm not big on fast food but I was hungry. I like how the digital kiosk systems works. Fast easy to use. No wait, no hassle. They bring your food to you. That's a plus. The food is the usual , this time I had gotten the butter milk chicken sandwich. It was good, dry but flavorful.

This is starting to happen to n a lot of Mac Donald locations but I noticed it and spoke to a manager. First I noticed the person working the fries section dumping old fries to pack new order fries. At the price food is we should be gettingâ€¦

Worse place to go  they give me the wrong burger and when they try to fix it they just added the other meat it was missing. since i order a double meat and got the single one. in order to fix it and make it rite  lets give it the same just add the meat to it

>>WARNING TO ALL CUSTOMER<<
On December 3rd 2021, at 300 E 204 St, Bx, NY 10467, McDonald's customer long slow waiting line is so long that it reaches McDonald entrance door, that when sneaky teenagers are goes to the kiosk machine to order their food and chooses the pay at the register option. They don't return back to the line, they sneak up to the register, this is unacceptable for the customers waiting on line. I complained to the assigned McDonald's female manager (Hispanic short female, a little stocky with a hairball Style on top of her head, she was not wearing a name tag or no manager picture on their walls) she ignore me, received no respond and walked away. This is Unbecoming Off! unprofessional display from a supervisor and allowing the teenagers to sneak out from their waiting line, use McDonald's kiosk, chooses the pay at the register option to sneak up in front of the line. Photos are enclosed for proof of the long slow waiting line. ðŸ˜¡
At McDonald's, 300 E 204 St, Bx., NY 10467., Their McDonald's small pieces of 4 process with by-product chicken McNuggets for 99 cent went up to 1.39 cent, in fact they raise their prices on most of their items. Other McDonald's in the Bronx prices has not gone up.
Thank God a brand new Popeyes Chicken Restaurant open up across the street on 204 St., their chickens parts are not process, it's real meat! GOODBYE McDonald's! SEE YA, HATE TO BE YA!!

Disgusting they burned my sandwich. There were no other customers there zero excuse as to why this would happen esp when Iâ€™m the only customer there. Also sundae machine doesnâ€™t work all of a sudden because he finished cleaning. This is laziness torwards customers

This has to be one of the worst McDonald's in the Bronx. My experience at this location was horrible. Don't get me started on the food the food was cold the portions when did McDonald's actually started looking out for portions I began a little bit of fries in my medium fries, I hope the necessary steps is taken to make this place a better experience moving forward for other customers

I ordered value menu and asked to add drink for $1 which was advertised on their board. The cashier said the computer is not able to add drink for $1, so he called the manager. This manager called Maria is the rudest person I have encountered. She said the same thing about computer not able to discount the drink. I requested that she can give discount since she is the manager. At this point she shouted at me and said no order for me and asked the cashier not to serve me. Her behavior was racist and McDonald's should not be hiring such managers. Hope you will take some disciplinary action.

Nice, courteous staff. I have never had a bad encounter. Always clean or getting cleaned. Best hours to visit are after 7pm when the dinner rush is over. They are very fast so I usually just order take out.

Sometimes they screw up your order by leaving something out, so check your bag. They have forgotten whole meals in the past.
My fries were cold, and when I asked for more sauce they were being stingy like they get paid enough to give me an attitude. Been coming here my whole childhood. Very disappointed.

Ordered an orange juice for breakfast and It tasted very watery, other than that the service is okay. I asked for a plastic bag and the lady working behind the counter wanted to charge me for it and she had a bad attitude.

Been there many times...I live in the neighborhood. It doesn't matter what you order. The staff always seems to screw up the order. I ordered a quarter pounder with cheese and bacon with let/tom...they gave me a chicken sandwich deluxe in a quarter pounder with cheese box..with the correct receipt on it..the management are always constantly yelling at their staff...in front of the customers. I guess that's why there are so many new workers at this location...everybody quits...FYI...if you customize your order 9 times out 10 the staff will get it wrong....

I went in there to use the ATM within seconds I walked out to the other store I checked to see where my phone was and realized i misplaced it so i retrace my steps went back to ask the employee at register if she seen my phone in the the McDonald's i might of left it by the atm she said no she aint see my phone but the whole time the employees had my phone because at the same time I had someone calling they is dead wrong and I feel discriminated feel like they had no right to be playing with someone belongings and I came right back in ask for my phone so what yall was tryna look through my phone I don't get it

I order my food got it  quality but the fries was over cook  a little and no ketchup in the bags and 2 napkins . My friend ordered a crispy chicken and sandwich had no lettuce no mayo no tomatoes just the chicken and bun all dry up. Need to improve this food because we're paying to much to get my food looking like  two day old food.

Using the kiosk machine to order was pretty fast and easy until the end when they asked me to grab a tablet and to enter the number. I didn't know what they were referring to and when I pressed the help button no came for about 15 minutes.â€¦

I felt that establishment should have been closed during the remodel of the store dust  is within in the air that makes the air  quality not save this is flu  season that makes the quality of the air not safe there were few people in thereâ€¦

It says they are 24hrs, but if you're ever in the area during the 2am- 4am times, you will most likely find the doors locked and no one in sight as I often do. That being said, they overcooked the hash browns, and it was the best thing ever!! On the flip side, the muffins were tough as steak.

One of the Best McDonald's Restaurants that I know. Well remodeled. It's big. Clean, and well organized. However, they are super slow. They should have more staff or speed up a little bit more. Because they know they're a busy restaurantâ€¦

Today,  service was pretty fast and  efficient. Although, the self order machine was working,  paying with cards was not working at the machine.  So i had to take the ticket to the cashier to pay(little inconvenience) and make another line.â€¦
Very nice costumer service, good ladies managers...they all helpful

Great staff been going there for over 30+ years. Morning staff is great, friendly, knowledgeable. The evening staff is good they do get overwhelmed the manger  Brittany, Jasmine, Tabatha are outstanding and there staff is on point. But thisâ€¦

This location was very dirty inside, letting people sit inside not consuming anything, was a concern. Food all over the waiting area. My French fries was stale, and apple pie was cold! I wish them well, but do better.

Service is a bet too slow. Went in as I ordered online and it took longer for me to get my order, even though I was able to confirm my order was recieved instantly. As I'm waiting notice my order (coffee) was ready and it took more then 5â€¦

This location needs some work. The table in lobby are are always gready&filthy with food,bags scraps. There lobby staff needs to get on point with customer service..If you want your food hot hot you have to ask, all the time damm. This location is priceless spsc6hetr and they know it. Corporste needs to do a complete over hall here!!
So far, this McDonald's out beats previous visits to other locations. I like the music. Very clean. I had Sunday breakfast today. It was soo good. Thumbs up y'all ðŸ‘.

This is from a mobile order customer perspective: I like how organized the system establish to pick up your food has been. Sometimes during peak hours you do have a bit of a crowd waiting on their orders ( especially now with the Ubereatsâ€¦
